name: college-tools
description: Google Apps Script project for college selection and tracking

scripts.prepush: npm run lint:check && echo 'Linting passed - ready for clasp push'
scripts.version:patch: npm run version:update $(node -p "require('./package.json').version.replace(/(.+\\.)?(\\d+)$/, (_, p, n) => p + (+n + 1))")
scripts.version:minor: npm run version:update $(node -p "require('./package.json').version.replace(/(\\d+\\.)(\\d+)(\\..+)/, (_, maj, min, patch) => maj + (+min + 1) + '.0')")
scripts.release: npm run version:patch && npm run push

author: College Tools
